body: yo people I am CharlZe and I am bringing out a new map called sequelidin. I have recently contacted my irl friend and he is a map rev who really likes it, it is a nebula map that in my time is the best one so far. I may also be known as pricey108 and I entered a map that got accepted called Mathis but it has not been put onto rotations and am wondering when it will be. Hope to have fun and c U all l8r
